# Web Designer

Zuraiz Abbas is a passionate 18-year-old UI/UX designer from Lahore, Pakistan. Starting during his A-Levels, his curiosity for digital design led him to explore tools like Figma and build real projects from scratch. Entirely self-taught, he’s already worked with clients to rebrand legacy businesses and craft clean, user-friendly interfaces. With a growing focus on clarity, structure, and empathy, Zuraiz continues to shape his design journey — one screen at a time

<br>
